name: Project S.L.I.M.E. (Dioinecail, Anm0n)
description:
You play as a scientist who experiments with parasites, humans and ... SLIMES!

Your goal is to use parasites on humans and slimes to make HUMANS defeat the slimes, but that won't be an easy task!!  

!!!!WARNING!!!!

ITEMS ARE NOT REFUNDED BETWEEN LEVELS

If the game UI looks wonky and you can’t drop upgrades from inventory, please set browser scaling to 100% :(

!!!!WARNING!!!!

Controls: 

Mouse - drag items

1 - 4 numbers => control speed

Spacebar => pause/resume game
